projects.project_descr: Generate an economic sustainable development through a process of urban revitalization of neglected or degraded historical city centres while initiating employment, social inclusion and job creation for vulnerable groups or youth unemployed

The Project “Establishment and Development of Business Incubators in Romania” aims to support the entrepreneurial spirit and economic development of the targeted areas, by through the development of the SME sector.
projects.project_title: Establishment and Dev. of Business Incubators

projects.project_descr: The Project aims to increase the financial management capabilities of adult population in Romania.
Improving Financial Sustainability of the Carpathian System of Protected Areas
projects.project_title: Financial Sustainability of Carpathian Protected Areas

projects.project_descr: The project will develop the Social Economy concept in Romania and implement a set of activities that will increase the awareness among targeted vulnerable groups and the general population.
The project promotes Social Economy as an instrument for integrated development, with a special focus on Roma women, Roma with disabilities and Roma post institutionalised children.
The project stimulate employers’ and other stakeholders’ interest to increase investment in human resources and to increase Romanian companies’ social responsibility.
projects.project_title: Increased adaptability of Rom companies through CSR

projects.project_title: Improving Energy Efficiency in Low-Income Households

projects.project_title: Reintegration of ex-convicts into labor market & society

projects.project_descr: The UNDP supports the Permanent Electoral Authority (PEA) and local public administration by strengthening their capacity to implement best practices in electoral management and to conduct multi-party elections in accordance with international standards.
projects.project_title: Support to PEA in Electoral Management

projects.project_descr: Support the Government of Romania in achieving its development objectives through building a successful tourism sector based on its cultural heritage and environmental assets.
projects.project_title: Integrated Urban Development for Soustainable Tourism

projects.project_descr: Strengthening the capacity of the National Institute of Statistics to increase the credibility of the census data and the legitimacy particularly regarding national minorities’ issues.
